title: When is season restarting Riot should have already released/set a date

replies.body: Why do you guys ignore the rads error problem??

We arent ignoring the rads error problem. To my knowledge we found the issue to the mass rads errors and it was fixed a few days ago. If you are still getting the error please contact player support.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They will be able to help you. If you cant access their website, post screen shots of the error you're getting to the help and support boards. Also post details about what OS you are using and ISP.
Time to play, Bait or Stupid!

When I was on NA Board the other day, someone said season 5 starts with next patch.

Not sure though.

well thats obvious....

thats like saying season 5 starts next season.
